definitions: The state of having no protection from something harmful.
A physical condition resulting from being outside in severe weather without adequate protection.
The action of placing oneself at risk of financial losses, e.g. through making loans or underwriting insurance.
The revelation of something secret, especially something embarrassing or damaging.
The publicizing of information or an event.
The action of exposing a photographic film to light.
The quantity of light reaching a photographic film, as determined by shutter speed and lens aperture.
The direction in which a building faces; an outlook.
